gold has been removed from your bank box.

: joined the party.

The manor lord is unavailable. Please use the teleporter on your right.

You manage to untangle yourself.

You destroyed the item.

My thanks for the patronage.

Your mind feels normal again.
Your skin returns to normal.
The damage you received fuels your battle fury.
You prepare to Backstab your opponent.
You begin to move quietly.
The soul charge effect converts some of the damage you received into mana.

Being perfectly rested, you shove them out of the way.
You can move!

You strike and hide in the shadows!

You missed your opponent with a Death Strike.
You can breathe normally again.
You have been mortally wounded!
You are no longer mortally wounded.
Wait! I have an opportunity for you to make some gold!
Adventurer! I have an offer for you.
You there! Care to hear how to earn some easy gold?
Excuse me please traveler, might I have a little of your time?
You successfully decode a treasure map!
*The pet's battle experience has slightly increased!*
You perform a masterful defense!
The old chest crumbles when you hit it.
that hit the spot. . .
I'm still hungry. . .
The food is good, but the service stinks!
The treasure is marked by the red pin. Grab a shovel and go dig it up!
aaahhh. . . that's the good stuff!
got any salt?
Where shall you dig for your treasure?
mmm. . .

The master of this realm has been slain! You may only stay here so long.
Your party has disbanded.
: rejoined the party.

is now guarding you.

is bleeding profusely!

points for turning in an item for Clean Up Britannia.

A corrosive gas seeps out of your enemy's skin!
You are no longer under the protection of the slimy ointment.
The acid river burns your skin.
Greetings. Have a look around.
Bring me 10 of the lost treasures of Tokuno and I will reward you with a valuable item.
Select the poison you wish to use.
To what do you wish to apply the poison?
You prepare to perform a Shadowjump.
Will you be my friend?
It would be mutually beneficial if we were to join forces.
I can protect you from the dangers of this world.
Tame which animal?
Don't be afraid.
Come here...
I've been searching for a companion like you.
Will you travel with me, noble creature?
I've always wanted a pet like you.
I promise to take good care of you.
For less I shall teach thee less.
The tainted life force energy damages you as your body tries to absorb it.
If you accompany me, we will protect one another.
I won't hurt you.
You have achieved the highest path in Valor and can no longer gain any further.
The creature spills a pool of acidic slime!
spits a poisonous substance at you!
You are infused with intense energy.
